posts.post_title: FS:  T206  * 2 Cy Youngs still available *  PSA
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Adam
I currently have the following T206s for sale:

T206 Cy Young, Bare Hand Shows, PSA 3 - $470
T206 Cy Young, Glove Shows, PSA 4 - $670

T206 Walter Johnson, Hands at Chest, PSA 4 - **SOLD**
T206 Walter Johnson, Portrait, PSA 4 - **SOLD**
T206 Christy Mathewson, White Cap, PSA 4 - **SOLD**
T206 Cy Young, Portrait, PSA 2 - **SOLD**
T206 Kid Elberfeld, Washington Portrait, PSA 4 - **SOLD**
T206 Christy Mathewson, Dark Cap, PSA 3 - **SOLD**
T206 Christy Mathewson, Portrait, PSA 3 - **SOLD**

Front and back scans are all below.  Prices include delivery and there is no additional surcharge if you would like to pay via Paypal (send Paypal to aamoniz@yahoo.com).

Please email me at aamoniz@yahoo.com if you would like any!

Regards,
Adam
